item.description:
Hi Everyone:

I have a tee time for 11:52 am on Saturday, May 1, 2010 at Hillview in North Reading and will make another tee time tomorrow if I get more than three responses, which I hope I do. From what I remember, the course is pretty flat. Since it is going to be a beautiful weekend and too hard to pass up golf when it is nice, I wanted to put it on the calendar.

Please let me know as soon as possible, if you can. Thank you. Enjoy the rest of your week. I look forward to hearing from you. Robin

My cell number is 617-640-9634

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Golf at Hillview
